alert.note: Alert for Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 09 at 6:37AM MST until November 10 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT CST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations in excess of one quarter of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Roberts County. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to midnight CST Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
